workflow.name: sap-db
workflow.longdesc:
Configure a SAP database instance including:
1) virtual IP addresses for the SAP database instance 2) a fileystems on shared storage /sapdb, 3) SAPinstance for the database.

parameters.stepdesc: The ID specified here is for the SAP Database instance resource group.

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for the SAP Database instance resource group in the cluster.

template.name: sapdb
template.stepdesc: This is the SAP Database instance.

template.name: sap-virtual-ip-db
template.stepdesc: The IP address configured here will be for the SAP Database instance.

template.name: sap-filesystem-sapdb
template.stepdesc:
This filesystem is for the SAP database (typically mounted on /sapdb).
If a filesystem does not already exist on the block device specified here, you will need to run mkfs to create it, prior to starting the filesystem resource. You will also need to create the mountpoint directory on all cluster nodes.

override.name: operations
override.value: op stop timeout=300 op monitor interval=30 timeout=130
